summary: A guy whose life is in turmoil falls for an attractive real estate broker who moves into the condo next door, but doesn't realize that she expects him to move out for her planned renovation.
cast: Matthew Modine|Michèle Laroque|Katie Walder|Richard Kind|Danielle Bisutti|Ed Quinn|Ann Cusack|Robert Della Cerra|Patrick Breen|Gia Mantegna|Krysten Leigh Jones|Samantha Droke|Yvette Nicole Brown|David Youse|Chip Sickler|Meredith Scott Lynn|Marc Casabani|Dominic Dettore|Michael Bentt|Lenny Schmidt|Don Wallace|Navid Noorvash|Luz Estrada|Meredith Majors|Zoe Aggeliki
title: Vecinos
